Charles B. Higgenbotham

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Higgenbothan
  2. Foster Name:
  3. Foster Family: G. W. Craig
  4. Location of Family: Geneva, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Geneva, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 14
  8. Date of Birth: 1875-08-02, NY
  9. Date of Death: 1951-08-22, Lincoln, NE
  10. Gender: male
  11. Spouse Name: Anna M. Danielson
  12. Source: OTR 212 p 31; Eloise Thomsen Corres.; National Orphan Train Complex; 1930 United States Federal Census; 1910 United States Federal Census; Detweiler letter (Eloise Thomsen Corres.); Fillmore County Republican (Geneva), 14 May 1890.
